activities: When MageMojo, LLC is data controller: MageMojo, LLC collects personal information from prospective customers, prospective employees, prospective vendors and other persons located in the European Union who may be interested in a business relationship with MageMojo, LLC via website visits, telephone calls, chat, web forms, emails, written correspondence, third party providers and other means; MageMojo, LLC uses this information to contact those persons about MageMojo, LLC services, employment opportunities, and potential business transactions, and to generally improve the way MageMojo, LLC markets its services. MageMojo, LLC collects personal information from its customers, participants in its channel partner program, vendors and employees located in the European Union via website visits, telephone calls, chat, web forms, emails, written correspondence, third party providers and other means; MageMojo, LLC uses that information to provide services to those customers (these purposes may include any of the following: process service requests, contract negotiation, handle orders, deliver services, process payments, communicate with customers about orders, services, promotional offers and marketing to such businesses, providing customer support, manage customer relationship, developing and improving the services, fraud detection and prevention, compliance with governmental, legislative and regulatory bodies); manage relations with vendors; for related financial and other operational purposes; and to perform its own human resources functions. When MageMojo, LLC is a data processor: MageMojo, LLC affiliates located in the European Union provide MageMojo, LLC with personal information about their prospective customers, prospective vendors, prospective employees; and customers, participants in its channel partner program, vendors and employees; MageMojo, LLC uses this information to assist its affiliates in providing services to those customers, and to assist its affiliates with vendor relations and contract management, human resources management, and their internal financial and other operations. When providing information technology hosting services, MageMojo, LLC may process personal data controlled by its customers or customers of MageMojo, LLC entities located in the European Union; MageMojo, LLC does not determine the types of data its customers store on MageMojo, LLC’s servers and/or how that data is classified, accessed, exchanged or otherwise processed. MageMojo, LLC customers are responsible for compliance with applicable data protection principles. MageMojo, LLC processes that data at the direction of its customers and in accordance with the terms of its agreements with its customers and a data processing agreement in place with each of its entities located in the EU (in accordance with the standards of the EU Data Protection Directive). Human Resources Privacy Policy is located on internal Policy website.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: European Union data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
